actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to modernize payments for ambulatory surgical centers under the medicare program.
short_title: Ambulatory Surgical Center Medicare Payment Modernization Act of 2005

summary.text: Ambulatory Surgical Center Medicare Payment Modernization Act of 2005 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to revise the requirements and the formula for payments for services furnished to individuals in ambulatory surgical centers.

titles.title: Ambulatory Surgical Center Medicare Payment Modernization Act of 2005
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to modernize payments for ambulatory surgical centers under the medicare program.
